title: Iran Shutters Airspace After Israel Strikes, Trackers Show Planes Rerouting
summary_full: Civilian flight traffic over Iran was re-routed in a hurry Saturday morning  visuals from lightradar24 showed a majority of commercial jets skirting its southern borders, i.e., flying over Iraq and Kuwait before flying over the Persian Gulf.
